results.name: a(1) = 1, a(2*n) = 2*a(n), a(2*n+1) = floor(a(n)/2).
comment: All terms are either zero or a power of 2;
A264784 gives lengths of runs of zeros.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2047
